---
title: Vascular Endothelial Growth Factor (VEGF)
---




# Overview

- Represents a growth factor with pro-angiogenic activity, with mitogenic and anti apoptotic effect on endothelial cells, increasing the vascular permeability, promoting cell migration @melincoviciVascularEndothelialGrowth2018
- Regulates normal and pathological angiogenic (growth of blood vessels) processes @melincoviciVascularEndothelialGrowth2018
